cab.content: From Viceroy, Army Department, 4.th July 1917. (Received at India Office, 7.0 a.m., 5th.) 9837. Mahsud operations. 29th and 30th.. Force moved camp toBoji^^) without molestation, operations being suspended during'thenegotiations reported separately. Health of British troops fair, Indiantroops, good.
